title: How To Avoid Boss Booby Traps
dc:creator: Tracy Brinkmann | Personal Development in the spirit of Tony Robbins, Napoleon Hill, & Zig Ziglar
description:
Model leaders build successful companies and lead important organizations. Â You know those ones that you look back and think THANK GOD FOR so and so and their leadership. Â We have been or watched these leaders build their business, team or organization... making all the right moves then BOOM they get blown up. Often they are blown up by issues they didn't see coming. Â Let me share five boss booby traps or leadership land mines that come from personal experience as well as what I have seem some very successful leaders do. Here are leadership tips to help you toÂ reach Your Success At Last! - CLICK & LISTEN then LIKE & SHARE!
